title: 3 and Out - Brady Hiatus Explained, Bills ‘Punt God’ Backlash, Scott Frost Disaster
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Brady Hiatus Explained, Bills ‘Punt God’ Backlash, Scott Frost Disaster
description:
John discusses why Tom Brady’s training camp hiatus makes sense, if the Bills acted fast enough in cutting ex-punter Matt Ariza following rape allegations, and why Nebraska should have fired HC Scott Frost after last season. He also takes a quick turn to give Rory McIlroy props for his Tour Championship win and elevating his profile as the face of the PGA Tour.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
